{{relevant category|Unobtainable}}

An '''unobtainable resource''' is a type of [[non-renewable resource]]. They may naturally generate but can't be obtained in [[Survival]] without using mods or glitches.

== Generates in the world ==
* {{BlockLink|Bedrock}}
* {{BlockLink|Budding Amethyst}}
* {{BlockLink|Chorus Plant}}
* {{BlockLink|End Gateway}}
* {{BlockLink|End Portal}}
* {{BlockLink|End Portal Frame}}
* {{BlockLink|Farmland}}
* {{BlockLink|Frogspawn}}
* {{BlockLink|id=all infested blocks|link=Infested Block|text=Infested Stone}}
* {{BlockLink|Monster Spawner}}
* {{BlockLink|Reinforced Deepslate}}
* {{BlockLink|Sculk Shrieker}} (with the {{cd|can_summon}} tag set to {{cd|true}})
* {{BlockLink|Trial Spawner}}
** {{BlockLink|Ominous Trial Spawner}}
* {{BlockLink|Vault}}
** {{BlockLink|Ominous Vault}}
